title: Problems with installing League
body: So, i actually reinstalled windows on my PC, and i have problem installing League. I download installer from official page, start download, set direction, and then it starts installing. But it actually stops and sits for hours at "Extracting files from archive" phase. Can any of you help me, or show me where i can find any help? Thanks :) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: I'm thinking this might be a security setting with your OS or some software that's blocking your game files from preparing for the install.  I suggest starting off with each step in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure league is being added as an exception.  That should do it!
